text: Reggie Jantjies was a South African football player. == Career == Jantjies played for an amateur club, Idas Valley AFC, in his native Stellenbosch, before starring for Hellenic and Cape Town Spurs in the FPL in the 1980s and 1990s. == Death == Jantjies died in hospital on 12 September 2018. He had been suffering from diabetes and had had his leg amputated. == References == Category:South African soccer players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Year of birth missing
title: Reggie Jantjies
